description.author: Dr. Alistair Ward
description.description: An application which searches for a solution to the configured school-timetable problem.

package-flags.name: hdbc-mysql
package-flags.description: Link with the package "HDBC-mysql" & consequently the native MySQL-interface (which will require a development package for 'mysqlclient'), which the application can use to connect to a MySQL data-server.

package-flags.name: hdbc-odbc
package-flags.description: Link with the package "HDBC-odbc", which the application can use to connect to a generic data-server.

package-flags.name: llvm
package-flags.description: Whether the 'llvm' compiler-backend has been installed and is required for code-generation.

package-flags.name: printdbqueries
package-flags.description: Whether to print SQL-queries as the database is read. N.B.: only relevant when either of the flags 'HDBC-odbc' or 'HDBC-mysql' is True. N.B.: the output will be more readable when 'queryDBConcurrently' is off.

package-flags.name: printdbrows
package-flags.description: Whether to print the rows read from the database. N.B.: only relevant when either of the flags 'HDBC-odbc' or 'HDBC-mysql' is True. N.B.: the output will be more readable when 'queryDBConcurrently' is off.

package-flags.name: querydbconcurrently
package-flags.description: Whether database-queries should be issued concurrently.

package-flags.name: static
package-flags.description: Link statically, perhaps for deployment in an environment where one doesn't have root access.
